description: >
  On Feb. 13, 2023, BOEM announced the availability of a draft Environmental Impact Statement (DEIS) for the proposed SouthCoast Wind wind energy project offshore Massachusetts. The DEIS was posted online and on Feb. 17, BOEM published the Notice of Availability in the Federal Register, initiating the formal start of a 45-day public comment period, originally scheduled to end Apr. 3, 2023. This comment period has now been extended by 15 calendar days. BOEM is extending the comment period based on requests from the public.
